Fry Sauce

Yield: About 1/3 cup

condiment

Ingredients

  • 2 tbsp ketchup
  • 2 tbsp mayonnaise
  • 1 tbsp pickle relish
  • 1 tbsp finely chopped onion
  • 1 clove garlic, grated or finely minced

Procedure

  1. In a small bowl, combine ketchup, mayonnaise, pickle relish, chopped onion, and garlic.
